project.name: C-C124A-FFMP-07-ST04-DT05-DF17-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C124A-FFMP-07-ST04-DT05-DF17-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2873 -s 596 -m "AAA" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C124A-FFMP-07-ST04-DT05-DF17-CF23-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2873 -s 596 -m "This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_iPp2rJbKmsa5xMo2GGaJ AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_5T5EUS5sbg OR segfault_code_dPWUyDKdb9 OR segfault_code_rwI7PMpRS7 OR segfault_code_2Al88WVECt OR segfault_code_AyEVo4wqc1 OR segfault_msg_lXzv4gtyrW OR illegal_inst_msg_uY31B4teMy) AND NOT timeout_XFFU5rrFCM) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_5T5EUS5sbg OR segfault_code_dPWUyDKdb9 OR segfault_code_rwI7PMpRS7 OR segfault_code_2Al88WVECt OR segfault_code_AyEVo4wqc1 OR segfault_msg_lXzv4gtyrW OR illegal_inst_msg_uY31B4teMy) OR timeout_XFFU5rrFCM)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_5T5EUS5sbg OR segfault_code_dPWUyDKdb9 OR segfault_code_rwI7PMpRS7 OR segfault_code_2Al88WVECt OR segfault_code_AyEVo4wqc1 OR segfault_msg_lXzv4gtyrW OR illegal_inst_msg_uY31B4teMy) AND NOT timeout_XFFU5rrFCM) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_5T5EUS5sbg OR segfault_code_dPWUyDKdb9 OR segfault_code_rwI7PMpRS7 OR segfault_code_2Al88WVECt OR segfault_code_AyEVo4wqc1 OR segfault_msg_lXzv4gtyrW OR illegal_inst_msg_uY31B4teMy) OR timeout_XFFU5rrFCM))
